title: Wings in the Night Part 1
description: Indulge in six dark and sexy tales from Maggie Shayne's award-winning vampire series Wings in the Night. Part 1 of the collection includes "Twilight Phantasies, Twilight Memories, Twilight Illusions, Beyond Twilight, Born in Twilight, " and "Twilight Vows."
author: Maggie Shayne
